bonus.value: After hitting a target with a flame weapon, increase final damage by 5%/6%/7%/8% and final crit rate by 2.5%/2.5%/3%/3% for 25 seconds, stacking up to 2 times. Only the effect with the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.

When equipping 2 or more flame weapons, gain the Flowing Fire effect, which increases final damage by 11%/13%/15%/17%, and increases crit damage by an additional 22%/24%/26%/28% within 25 seconds of landing a critical hit. For every 3 charged attacks that hit the target, restore 1 dodge attempt. Cooldown: 2 seconds. Only the effect of the highest star rating is applied when obtained repeatedly.

memory.name: Blank Command
memory.desc: It easily becomes unresponsive without a command.
